title: Register For Free Trial
author: unknown
text: Jindal Group planning to acquire Vitkovice steel Steel sector major Jindal Group is in talks with Czech-based Vitkovice Steel to acquire 100 percent stakes. The deal is valued at approximately 150 million euros (approx 1000 crore) and will mark their first European acquisition by the firm. The firm aims to strengthen its European presence and address CBAM regulations. Also Read: Rs 5,400 crore investment planned chalked out by Jindal Stainless
